mapper.select: SELECT bs.id, bs.bank_card_id, bs.pay_money_all, bs.pay_money_month, bs.pay_month_number, bs.status, bs.is_del, bc.bank_card_number, bu.user_name FROM bank_loans bs LEFT JOIN bank_card bc ON bs.bank_card_id = bc.id LEFT JOIN bank_user bu ON bc.user_id = bu.id WHERE bs.`status` = #{status}

SELECT bs.id, bs.bank_card_id, bc.bank_card_number, ba.`name` as user_name, bs.pay_money_all, bs.pay_money_month, bs.pay_month_number, bs.repayment_time, bs.type FROM bank_loans bs LEFT JOIN bank_card bc ON bs.bank_card_id = bc.id LEFT JOIN base_data ba ON bc.type = ba.id WHERE bc.user_id = #{id} AND bs.is_del = #{isDel}
